WishlistItem.name: WishlistItem
WishlistItem.description: Represents an item on a Wishlist in a store built with B2B Commerce for Lightning.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD.Possible values are:

Name.description: The name of this WishlistItem record. Name can be up to 255 characters.

Product2Id.description: The ID of the product that is represented by the WishlistItem.

WishlistId.description: The ID of the parent Wishlist of this WishlistItem.
